name: google-docs
description: Google Docs API for document creation, formatting, and collaborative review

tools.name: create_document
tools.description: Create a new Google Doc with the specified title and content

parameters.title: Document title
parameters.content: Document content in markdown or plain text
parameters.folder_id: Google Drive folder ID to create the document in

tools.name: update_document
tools.description: Update the content of an existing Google Doc

parameters.document_id: ID of the document to update
parameters.append: If true, append content instead of replacing

tools.name: apply_formatting
tools.description: Apply formatting to a range of text in the document

parameters.formatting: Formatting to apply (bold, italic, heading_level, font_size)

tools.name: share_document
tools.description: Share the document with specified email addresses

tools.name: export_document
tools.description: Export the document in the specified format

parameters.output_path: Local path to save the exported file

tools.name: get_document
tools.description: Retrieve the content and metadata of a document

parameters.document_id: ID of the document to retrieve

notes: Google Docs MCP server is optional. If not configured, the team outputs content as local Markdown files. The service account must have access to the target Google Drive folder. Share the folder with the service account email address found in the credentials JSON.
